sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { BarChart3, FileText, Image, Video, Mail, Palette, Clock, TrendingUp } from 'lucide-react'; import { useWebsiteBuilder } from '../context/WebsiteBuilderContext'; const WebsiteStats = () => { const { getWebsiteStats } = useWebsiteBuilder(); const stats = getWebsiteStats(); const getComponentTypeIcon = (type) => { const iconMap = { 'hero': '🎯', 'text': '📝', 'grid': '✨', 'gallery': '🖼️', 'testimonials': '💬', 'contact': '📧', 'newsletter': '📰', 'product-grid': '🛍️', 'team': '👥', 'pricing': '💰', 'stats': '📊', 'timeline': '📅', 'accordion': '❓', 'tabs': '📑', 'social-feed': '📱', 'video-section': '🎥', 'image-text-overlay': '🖼️', 'product-detail': '📦', 'navbar': '🧭', 'breadcrumbs': '🍞', 'pagination': '📄', 'contact-advanced': '📞', 'hero-video': '🎬', 'hero-split': '📐', 'text-two-column': '📄', 'text-with-image': '🖼️', 'grid-4': '🎯', 'gallery-masonry': '🧱', 'gallery-carousel': '🎠', 'clients': '🏢' }; return iconMap[type] || '📄'; }; const getReadabilityScore = () => { const avgWordsPerSentence = stats.estimatedWordCount / Math.max(stats.totalComponents, 1); if (avgWordsPerSentence < 10) return { score: 'Excellent', color: 'text-green-600', bg: 'bg-green-100' }; if (avgWordsPerSentence < 15) return { score: 'Good', color: 'text-blue-600', bg: 'bg-blue-100' }; if (avgWordsPerSentence < 20) return { score: 'Fair', color: 'text-yellow-600', bg: 'bg-yellow-100' }; return { score: 'Complex', color: 'text-red-600', bg: 'bg-red-100' }; }; const readability = getReadabilityScore(); return (

Website Analytics

{/* Key Metrics */}
Components
{stats.totalComponents}
Words
{stats.estimatedWordCount}
Types
{Object.keys(stats.componentTypes).length}
Readability
{readability.score}
{/* Media Analysis */}

Media Analysis

{stats.hasImages ? 'Has Images' : 'No Images'}
{stats.hasForms ? 'Has Forms' : 'No Forms'}
{/* Component Breakdown */}

Component Breakdown

{Object.entries(stats.componentTypes) .sort(([,a], [,b]) => b - a) .slice(0, 5) .map(([type, count]) => (
{getComponentTypeIcon(type)} {type.replace('-', ' ')}
{count}
))}
{/* Recommendations */}

💡 Recommendations

    {stats.totalComponents < 3 && (
  • • Add more content sections to make your website more engaging
    • )} {!stats.hasImages && (
  • • Consider adding images to make your website more visually appealing
    • )} {!stats.hasForms && (
  • • Add a contact form to capture leads and inquiries
    • )} {stats.estimatedWordCount < 50 && (
  • • Add more descriptive content to improve SEO and user engagement
    • )} {Object.keys(stats.componentTypes).length < 3 && (
  • • Try different component types to create variety in your layout
    • )}
); }; export default WebsiteStats;
